WebUI:BringToFront.description: Puts this WebUI in the front of all WebUIs

WebUI:CallEvent.description: Calls an Event on the Browserâ€™s JavaScript

WebUI:LoadURL.description: Loads a new File/URL in this Browser

WebUI:SetFocus.description: Enables the focus on this browser (i.e. can receives keyboard and mouse input). Note: only one browser can have focus per time. When you click at the screen/WebUI the focus is got automatically as well

WebUI:IsVisible.description: Returns if this WebUI is currently visible

WebUI:SubscribeFailed.description: When this page fails to load

WebUI:SubscribeReady.description: When this page is fully loaded
